text: Not supported, but we are working on and thinking about it

Hey HubDB using devs,

Anyone out there like the new form based editor for tables enabled for dynamic pages, but wished that we supported inline editing and interactivity (click an element on the preview, and be brought to relevant fields in the sidebar for non-inline editable fields, like an image)?

We are trying to effectively figure out how to support this, and what the developer experience would be, and would love some feedback on some ideas.
